ccre.ctrl

Class EventMixing

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.ctrl.EventMixing

  • public class EventMixing
extends java.lang.Object
    EventMixing is a class that provides a wide variety of useful static methods to accomplish various common actions primarily relating to event channels.
    Author:
    skeggsc
    See Also:
    BooleanMixing, FloatMixing, Mixing

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static EventOutput ignored
      An EventOutput that, when fired, does absolutely nothing.
      static EventInput never
      An EventInput that will never be fired.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EventInput combine(EventInput... sources)
      Combine multiple EventInputs so that any event firing will fire the result event.
      static EventInput combine(EventInput a, EventInput b)
      Combine two EventInputs so that either event firing will fire the result event.
      static EventOutput combine(EventOutput... events)
      Returns a combination of the specified events such that the returned EventOutput will fire all arguments when fired.
      static EventOutput combine(EventOutput a, EventOutput b)
      Returns a combination of the specified events such that the returned EventOutput will fire both arguments when fired.
      static EventInput debounce(EventInput orig, int minMillis)
      Returns a debounced version of the specified EventInput, such that there is a minimum delay of minMillis milliseconds between events.
      static EventOutput debounce(EventOutput orig, int minMillis)
      Returns a debounced version of the specified EventOutput, such that there is a minimum delay of minMillis milliseconds between events.
      static EventInput filterEvent(BooleanInputPoll shouldAllow, boolean requirement, EventInput when)
      Return an EventInput that is fired when the specified EventInput is fired and the specified BooleanInputPoll is the specified requirement.
      static EventOutput filterEvent(BooleanInputPoll shouldAllow, boolean requirement, EventOutput target)
      When the returned EventOutput is fired and the specified BooleanInputPoll is the specified requirement, fire the passed EventOutput.

    • Method Detail

      • combine

        public static EventInput combine(EventInput a,
                 EventInput b)
        Combine two EventInputs so that either event firing will fire the result event.
        Parameters:
        a - the first event source
        b - the second event source
        Returns:
        the source that is fired by either of the original sources.

      • combine

        public static EventInput combine(EventInput... sources)
        Combine multiple EventInputs so that any event firing will fire the result event.
        Parameters:
        sources - the event sources
        Returns:
        the source that is fired by any of the original sources.

      • combine

        public static EventOutput combine(EventOutput... events)
        Returns a combination of the specified events such that the returned EventOutput will fire all arguments when fired.
        Parameters:
        events - the events to fire
        Returns:
        the trigger for firing the arguments.

      • combine

        public static EventOutput combine(EventOutput a,
                  EventOutput b)
        Returns a combination of the specified events such that the returned EventOutput will fire both arguments when fired.
        Parameters:
        a - the first event
        b - the second event
        Returns:
        the trigger for firing the arguments.

      • debounce

        public static EventOutput debounce(EventOutput orig,
                   int minMillis)
        Returns a debounced version of the specified EventOutput, such that there is a minimum delay of minMillis milliseconds between events. Any event sent before the timeout will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        orig - The EventOutput to debounce.
        minMillis - The minimum event delay.
        Returns:
        The debounced version of the event consumer.

      • debounce

        public static EventInput debounce(EventInput orig,
                  int minMillis)
        Returns a debounced version of the specified EventInput, such that there is a minimum delay of minMillis milliseconds between events. Any event sent before the timeout will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        orig - The EventInput to debounce.
        minMillis - The minimum event delay.
        Returns:
        The debounced version of the event source.

      • filterEvent

        public static EventOutput filterEvent(BooleanInputPoll shouldAllow,
                      boolean requirement,
                      EventOutput target)
        When the returned EventOutput is fired and the specified BooleanInputPoll is the specified requirement, fire the passed EventOutput.
        Parameters:
        shouldAllow - the input to test.
        requirement - the value to require.
        target - the target to fire.
        Returns:
        when to check if the target should be fired.

      • filterEvent

        public static EventInput filterEvent(BooleanInputPoll shouldAllow,
                     boolean requirement,
                     EventInput when)
        Return an EventInput that is fired when the specified EventInput is fired and the specified BooleanInputPoll is the specified requirement.
        Parameters:
        shouldAllow - the input to test.
        requirement - the value to require.
        when - when to check if the target should be fired.
        Returns:
        the target to fire.
